attributes.action: Honour the democratic vote of 17.4 million people and leave the Eu by 12/4/19
attributes.additional_details: Democracy is the corner stone of our nation and for that to continue the one of if not the largest democratic vote in our history needs to be honored
attributes.background: Great Britain is revered around the world as one of the great democratic nations and should remain so as democracy is the cornerstone of our great country, one person one vote everyone has a say in their own future.
